1)DecisionTree:-
mean:  4.3545573318139335
standard deviation  0.8842172810136002

2)Linear Regression:-
mean:  5.037482786117751
standard deviation  1.059438240560695

3)RandomForest Regression:-
mean:  3.3497759022830507
standard deviation  0.6493972559759817


RandomForest Regression is the best model  as it has less mean +- standard deviation 
next better model is Decision Tree
next better model is Linear Regreession
